entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 12 except plus 5 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 12 except plus 5 in onshore winds. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 22 April 2023
